entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind light except north 30 km/h over southern sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
